Eric Bottard is a core committer on the riff project, working at Pivotal. After hacking on enterprise projects for more than ten years, embracing Spring from day one, he joined the soon-to-become Pivotal division at VMware, working on Cloud Foundry and then Spring Cloud Data Flow.
